1.content:
A long time ago Cate's husband build a body swap machine that he was working on for his company. He finished it but died of a heart attack just soon after he finished it. Cate then covered it up in the basement not knowing what to do with it or what it was (same with their children) until now!

1.title: The machine.

11.content:
"Bridget, your grounded for the night for not getting home before 11 PM yesterday! Your not going anywhere tonight. I'm gonna go watch TV in my room." Cate (Bridget's Mom) said.

"Argh" Bridget said.

Bridget hated staying home and doing nothing. It was 6 o'clock and couldn't leave for the rest of the night til' morning! So she went into the basement to see if their was some extra food lying around but noticed the covered up machine, and wanted to find out what it was. She then took off the cover and said two pods and a control panel. She pressed "on" on the control panel and it booted up and open both the pod doors. She looked in one of them and inside the pod their was some little writing that said "Body Swap Machine - Pod 1". Then she realized she could maybe get her sister, Kerry or her Mom into the other pod and she could swap bodies with them so she could go out! But which one does she ask?

Rory in Bridget’s body was on his way to his new bedroom, when he bumped into his old body. “Give me my beautiful body back, you little pervert!” sad Bridget in Rory’s body, “I don’t know what you are talking about, Rory?” sad Rory in Bridget’s body. “Don’t play stupid, just swap our bodies back!” answered Bridget in Rory’s body mad, “Rory, how on earth can people swap bodies it is impossible! Where do you get these stupid idea’s?” sad Rory in Bridget’s body.
After talking to Bridget for another of hours Rory was feted up and decided to go to his new bedroom. In his new bedroom he decided to write something into Bridget’s diary, which of course was now his diary. Rory wrote the following in his new diary:

Dear dairy, 5 March, 2006

Yesterday I was a 14 year old teenage boy, but today I am a 17 year old teenage girl. You might question how a teenage boy can change into a teenage girl over a day, but it can happen. It all began yesterday afternoon when I was taking out the garbage. As I was walking to the side of the road I heard a old lady call for help, so decided to help the old lady. Her cat was stuck up in a tree and I rescued it. The old lady was so happy to have her cat back, so she told me that she will give me the power to swap bodies with one of my older sisters. At first I thought it must be a joke, today during lunch I decided to give it a try and here I am writing this with the body of my older sister Bridget.

Rory Hennessy

After Rory is done writing in his new diary, he puts the diary on Bridget’s nightstand and he gets ready to go to bed.

The next morning Rory wakes up…

133.content:
Rory was in his bed at night in a hot sweat, he had a really weird dream that he could now switch body parts and bodies. He was really freaked out but he wanted yo see if he could actually do it so he thought about switching with his mom for kicks, then everything went black.

He woke up in a hot sweat but it felt...different. first he was in his parents bedroom with the covers over his lower torso, but that's where it gets weirder. It looked like he had long feminine legs, but that was impossible...right? He looked down and he saw two double DDs hanging out in a white transparent nightie with no bra covering them from the world, Rory see's blondish hair fall down his chest, too.

He looks into a mirror on the nightstand near him and resists the urge to scream, in it he saw his new reflection: his own mom!

What happens next?
